derivation: from H6251 (עַשְׁתְּרָה) (as singular of H6252 (עַשְׁתָּרוֹת)) with a prepositional prefix; with Ashtoreth;
outline:
Beeshterah = "with increase"
  1. a Levitical city in Manasseh, east of the Jordan; probably identical with 'Ashtaroth'
strongs_def: Beeshterah, a place East of the Jordan
